turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What store would you like to pick up your coffee from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pick up the coffee from Starbucks in Northvale, NJ.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So, you want to pick up the coffee from the Starbucks Northvale branch in NJ at 271B Livingston St, Northvale, NJ 07647, USA. Is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of coffee do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a Black and White Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, not a problem. What size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what type of milk do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, not a problem. Would you want whipped cream on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please add the whipped cream to the top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, good. Do you want to add any special flavors.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that should be good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What time do you want to pick up your coffee from Starbucks on 271B Livingston St, Northvale, NJ 07647, USA.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to pick it up in around an hour.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, not an issue. Do you have an account with Starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I do.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, the coffee has been charged to your account.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The drink should be ready for pick up in an hour at the Starbucks branch at 271B Livingston St, Northvale, NJ 07647, USA.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, thanks so much.
